Package org.daiitech.naftah.builtin.lang

Class DeclaredFunction

java.lang.Object
org.daiitech.naftah.builtin.lang.DeclaredFunction
public final class DeclaredFunction extends Object
Definition of a function declared in the Naftah script.

This class wraps the original parse context of a function declaration and provides access to its components such as name, parameters, body, and return type.

Author:
Chakib Daii
